name: Drowzee
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Not popular with girls because of its attitude. Can often be heard muttering to itself in a low voice.

abilities.name: Long-Distance Hypnosis
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep; if tails, your Active Pokémon is now Asleep. The power can’t be used if Drowzee is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Nightmare
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
